headline: LyondellBasell announces quarterly dividend
summary: HOUSTON and LONDON, Nov. 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LyondellBasell (NYSE: LYB) today announced it has declared a dividend of $1.37 per share, to be paid to shareholders on Dec. 8, 2025, with an ex-dividend and record date of Dec. 1, 2025. About LyondellBasell We are LyondellBasell (NYSE: LYB) – a leader in the global chemical industry creating solutions for everyday sustainable living. Through advanced technology and focused investments, we are enabling a circular and low carbon economy. Acros

About LyondellBasell We are LyondellBasell (NYSE: LYB) – a leader in the global chemical industry creating solutions for everyday sustainable living.
